titleStmt.title: Die Jovis, 8. Julii, 1646. Ordered by the Commons assembled in Parliament, that all such persons as have presented their petitions at Goldsmiths-Hall, ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Title from heading and first lines of text.
Signed: H. Elsynge Cler. Parl. D. Com.
An order of the Commons fixing 1 August as the limit of time within which persons may "present their petitions at Goldsmiths Hall, or agree to their compositions."
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
